First the Test Cap file gets installed.

//* Date ={11 February 2017 19:34:28}
//* appletSize (in Bytes)={1007}

I: 00 A4 04 00 05 A0 00 00 01 94
O: 610F

// INSTALL for LOAD
I: 80 E6 02 00 11 0C A0 00 00 01 94 90 D7 F2 30 01 00 00 00 00 00 00
O: 9000

// LOAD
I: 80 E8 00 00 F4 C4 82 03 8C 01 00 16 DE CA FF ED 01 02 04 00 01 0C A0 00 00 01 94 90 D7 F2 30 01 00 00 02 00 1F 00 16 00 1F 00 14 00 4E 00 6E 00 21 02 2E 00 20 00 3A 00 00 00 FC 00 02 00 01 00 13 05 01 00 04 00 4E 05 00 01 07 A0 00 00 00 62 01 01 00 01 10 A0 00 00 00 09 00 05 FF FF FF FF 89 12 00 00 00 00 01 10 A0 00 00 00 87 10 05 FF FF FF FF 89 13 20 00 00 00 01 10 A0 00 00 00 09 00 05 FF FF FF FF 89 11 00 00 00 00 01 07 A0 00 00 00 62 00 01 03 00 14 01 10 A0 00 00 01 94 90 D7 F2 30 01 00 02 53 42 55 00 01 87 06 00 21 44 80 03 04 00 04 07 05 00 00 01 90 00 01 00 A8 00 C0 01 B3 80 02 00 81 08 01 0B 81 07 00 82 00 00 07 02 2E 00 05 44 03 29 05 03 29 06 1B 16 06 03 38 03 29 07 04 29 04 A8 00 8A 16 04 10 08 49 60 05 59 05 01 16 05 10 08 6F
O: 9000

// LOAD
I: 80 E8 00 01 F0 0D 59 06 01 1B 16 06 03 38 04 29 05 16 04 10 08 49 60 64 16 04 10 08 49 73 00 41 00 00 00 07 00 17 00 1C 00 21 00 26 00 2B 00 31 00 37 00 3D 03 29 07 70 27 04 29 07 70 22 05 29 07 70 1D 07 29 07 70 18 10 08 29 07 70 12 10 10 29 07 70 0C 10 20 29 07 70 06 10 40 29 07 16 07 19 16 04 10 08 47 25 53 65 12 1B 16 06 04 16 05 04 43 4D 5B 1B 16 06 25 55 38 59 04 01 16 04 1E 10 08 45 A7 FF 73 7A 02 21 03 31 70 0D 19 1E 25 02 6B 04 70 0A 59 02 01 1E 19 92 6C F2 1E 78 07 62 AD 00 03 AD 00 92 02 8D 00 0A 3B 18 1B 16 05 AD 00 8B 00 0D 18 AD 00 8B 00 0F 29 06 19 10 12 03 10 83 8E 04 00 04 17 19 08 7B 00 05 03 7B 00 05 92 8E 05 00 06 0F 19 10 0A 10 0F AD 00 03 16 06 8E 06 00 06 15 19 8E 01 00 04 18 61 38 AD 00 03 AD 00 92 02
O: 9000

// LOAD
I: 80 E8 00 02 F0 8D 00 0A 3B 1A 10 0D AD 00 03 8E 04 00 07 08 29 06 AD 00 03 25 29 07 19 10 81 16 07 AD 00 04 16 06 04 43 8E 06 00 04 19 19 8E 01 00 04 18 3B 7A 03 10 18 8C 00 08 18 11 00 FF 04 8D 00 09 87 01 18 11 00 FF 04 8D 00 09 87 00 18 8B 00 0B 18 04 8D 00 0C 87 02 18 8D 00 0E 87 03 18 04 8D 00 0C 87 02 18 8D 00 0E 87 03 AD 03 07 8E 02 00 10 00 7A 01 30 8F 00 11 8C 00 12 7A 02 21 18 8B 00 13 60 03 7A 19 8B 00 14 2D 1A 03 25 73 00 0B FF B0 FF B0 00 09 70 08 11 6E 00 8D 00 15 7A 06 27 8D 00 16 2E 8D 00 17 28 04 1D 73 00 6E 00 04 00 04 00 09 8D 00 18 28 05 15 05 15 05 8E 01 00 19 16 AD 01 03 15 05 8E 01 00 19 17 8E 05 00 07 06 29 06 AD 01 03 25 10 23 6B 40 AD 01 04 25 10 46 6B 38 10 07 90 0B 3D 03 10 2A 38 3D 04 10 31 38 3D
O: 9000

// LOAD
I: 80 E8 80 03 BC 05 10 31 38 3D 06 10 31 38 3D 07 10 2A 38 3D 08 10 31 38 3D 10 06 10 23 38 28 08 18 1B 15 04 15 08 03 10 07 8B 00 1A 7A 08 00 20 00 02 00 01 00 01 03 00 13 53 65 6E 64 69 6E 67 20 72 65 71 75 65 73 74 2E 2E 2E 2E 00 00 00 00 05 00 6E 00 1B 02 00 00 03 02 00 00 02 02 00 00 01 02 00 00 00 01 81 05 00 05 00 00 00 01 81 02 00 01 81 00 00 06 80 03 00 06 80 08 0D 06 80 10 03 03 80 03 01 06 83 03 00 03 00 00 08 06 81 10 00 03 00 00 09 01 81 09 00 01 00 00 00 06 00 01 46 03 80 03 03 03 80 0A 01 06 80 07 01 06 81 0E 00 06 81 11 00 06 82 03 00 01 82 01 00 03 00 00 0A
O: 9000

I: 00 A4 04 00 05 A0 00 00 01 94
O: 610F

// INSTALL for INSTALL
I: 80 E6 0C 00 47 0C A0 00 00 01 94 90 D7 F2 30 01 00 00 10 A0 00 00 01 94 90 D7 F2 30 01 00 02 53 42 55 00 0C A0 00 00 01 94 90 D7 F2 30 01 00 01 01 00 18 EA 14 80 0C 01 01 14 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 81 04 00 01 00 00 C9 00 00
O: 9000

Then the Testing procedure:

ME-SIM: Terminal Profile

SIM-ME: 9000

Network-ME: unformatted SMSPP message which the ME sends as envelope to the SIM
A0 C2 00 00 32 D1 30 02 02 83 81 06 06 91 55 55 95 99 99 0B 22 04 03 91 96 F6 7F F6 00 10 30 71 31 02 02 13 23 46 20 4E 65 74 35 20 31 32 35 20 43 46 41 20 33 36 38
Envelope break:
A0 C2 00 00 32 - Envelop command 
D1 - Smsp download Tag
30 - Length of the data
// SMS-PP is from Network to SIM
02 - Device identity Tag
02 - Length of the Device identity data
83 - Network -- Source
81 - SIM -- Destination
06 - Address Tag
06 - Length of the Adress data
91 55 55 95 99 99  -- +5555599999  (SMSC )
0B - SMS TDPU tag
22 - Length of the SMS TDPU data
04 - Message Type Indicator (Reject Duplicate)
03 - Length of the destination Adress
91 96 F6 -- 696( destination Adress shortcode)
7F -PID 
F6 -DCS 
00 10 30 71 31 02 02 - Service Center Time Stamp
13 - User data Length
23 46 20 4E 65 74 35 20 31 32 35 20 43 46 41 20 33 36 38 - User data (#F Net5 125 CFA 368)

SIM-ME-Network: USSD *111*1#

(NB: Please send me the SIM-ME-NETWORK procedure which will be implemented accordingly)
